business.headline: Explained: Why Sensex fell 4,000 points in 5 trading sessionsThe BSE Sensex plummeted over 4,000 points across five consecutive sessions, while the NSE Nifty50 fell approximately 1,200 points, representing a nearly 5% loss within the week.

Vivad Se Vishwas Scheme: FAQs for settling tax disputes easily Taxpayers can resolve pending income tax disputes under the Direct Tax Vivad Se Vishwas Scheme 2024 by settling the disputed tax amount and avoiding additional interest and penalties.

Nita Ambani to headline India Conference at HarvardThe India Conference at Harvard, one of the largest student-led India-focused events in the US, is hosted by students across Harvard's graduate and undergraduate schools.

Sensex nosedives 1,100 points, Nifty falls below 23,600; IT stocks tumbleStock market crash: The S&P BSE Sensex ended 1,176.46 points lower at 78,041.59, while the NSE Nifty50 settled 364.20 points lower at 23,587.50.

Sensex tumbles 1,000 points. What's behind the bloodbath on Dalal Street?Stock market today: The Sensex had fallen 1033.99 points to 78,184.06 at 3:00 pm, while the Nifty50 slipped 299.35 points to trade at 23,652.35. All broader market indices were also trading in negative territory.

Looking for high returns on investments? Check these 5 optionsBalancing risk and reward is essential for wealth creation. From equities to IPOs and P2P lending, explore these high-return investment options to align with your financial goals and risk appetite.

NACDAC Infra IPO allotment: Step-by-step guide to check statusThe Ghaziabad-based construction company's IPO, open from December 17 to December 19, offered shares in the price range of Rs 33-35 per share with a lot size of 4,000 shares.

Senores Pharmaceuticals IPO: Check latest GMP, price band and should you apply?Senores Pharmaceuticals IPO: The Ahmedabad-based pharmaceutical company is offering shares in a price range of Rs 372-391, with a minimum application size of 38 equity shares and multiples thereafter.
Zerodha launches Margin Trading Facility: What it is and how it worksZerodha's Nithin Kamath introduces Margin Trading Facility, enabling investors to leverage funds for stock delivery.

Ventive Hospitality IPO opens: Check latest GMP, price band, and other detailsVentive Hospitality IPO: The subscription window closes on December 24, 2024. The basis of allotment is expected to be finalised by December 26, with shares credited to demat accounts by December 27.
Sensex, Nifty extend losses amid weak global cuesAt 10:28 am, the S&P BSE Sensex fell 274.86 points to 78,943.19, while the NSE Nifty50 dropped 67.90 points to 23,883.80.
Rupee hits all-time low against US dollar. Why is it under pressure?The rupee surpassed its previous low of 85.0850 reached on Thursday and settled at 85.10 by 10:00 am.

Can you get a personal loan with low credit score? Check detailsWhile a low credit score may present challenges, using strategies like reduced DTI, and showing income stability, etc. can help secure a personal loan and improve your credit for the future.
Tata Consumer dismisses reports of Starbucks exiting India as baselessAn earlier report claimed that Starbucks was considering exiting the Indian market due to high costs and mounting losses.
Sensex ends nearly 1,000 points lower, Nifty below 24,000The Sensex ended 964.15 points lower at 79,218.05, while the Nifty50 settled 247.15 points lower at 23,951.70.

Missed ITR deadline? Here's your guide to filing belated return for AY 2024-25The last date to file a belated or revised ITR for FY 2023-24 is December 31, 2024—ensure all dues and penalties are paid to avoid additional charges.

Quick delivery, quicker success: Zepto founders top Hurun listZepto, established in 2021 by the duo of Kaivalya Vohra and Aadit Palicha, has revolutionised the quick-commerce sector with its 10-minute grocery delivery model.

US Fed rate cut decision: How will it impact Indian stock markets? The Sensex declined over 1,100 points and the Nifty fell below 24,000 after the US Federal Reserve's decision to cut interest rates by 0.25% to 4.5%, coupled with a hawkish outlook on future rate adjustments.

Mamata Machinery IPO: Latest GMP sees sharp rise; should you subscribe?Mamata Machinery, a leading manufacturer of packaging machines, seeks to raise Rs 179.39 crore from its offer for sale, with promoters selling up to 73.82 lakh equity shares at a face value of Rs 10 each.

entertainment.headline: House of cards actor Kevin Spacey given bail, what happens to #metoo now?From American Beauty to House of Cards, one of the most lauded actors of his generation, Kevin Spacey has a tainted reputation. In a new turn, the Oscar-winning actor "strenuously" denied allegations of sexual assault against him and got bail. Watch to know more

Images of Nayantara wearing sandals inside Tirupati temple sparks outrage against newlywed coupleAfter the grand wedding between Nayantara and Vignesh, the couple went to the Tirupati temple to offer prayers.

However, images of Nayantara wearing footwear inside the temple area has sparked outrage among the devotees against the couple.

While Vignesh was spotted walking barefoot, Nayantara was seen wearing sandals, which caused a massive uproar amongst devotees in the area.

Temple authorities issued a clarification saying it was permitted for devotees to wear footwear in that area.

Cannes Film Festival 2022: Deepika, Aishwarya walk the red carpet; Indian pavilion inauguratedThe 75th annual Cannes Film Festival began on May 17. Aishwarya Rai Bachchan and Deepika Padukone walked the red carpet on Day 3 of the 10-day film festival. 

On the second day, May 18, Union Minister for I&B, Youth Affairs & Sports, Anurag Thakur, inaugurated the India Pavilion at the Cannes Film Festival. The special event was also attended by several Indian celebrities, including Deepika Padukone, R. Madhavan, Nawazuddin Siddiqui, Tamannaah Bhatia and others.

Deepika Padukone, who is part of the Cannes 2022 jury, talked about Indian films at the event and said that she believes there will be a day when Cannes will be in India.
Disco king Bappi Lahiri passes away at 69 Singer-composer Bappi Lahiri passed away on Wednesday, February 16, at a Mumbai hospital. He was 69.

Andheri court summons Shilpa Shetty, Shamita, their mother Sunanda The Andheri court has issued summons to Bollywood actress Shilpa Shetty, her sister Shamita and their mother Sunanda over non-repayment of loan.

general news.headline: Saudi man arrested for German Christmas market attack that killed 2, injured 68German police have arrested a 50-year-old doctor from Saudi Arabia in connection with the incident. The doctor is a permanent resident of Germany and has been staying in the country for around two decades.

3 Hindu temples attacked, idols vandalised in Bangladesh; 1 arrestedOver two days, eight idols were vandalised in Hindu temples across Mymensingh and Dinajpur, escalating concerns over minority safety. Bangladesh Police arrested one person in connection with the incidents in Mymensingh.

Ex-Muslim, doctor, pro-far right: Many shades of man behind Germany market crashTaleb A, a 50-year-old Saudi doctor arrested in connection with the car attack on a crowd of revellers at a Christmas market in Germany's Magdeburg, had secured a permanent residence permit for Germany in 2006.

In-laws put chilli powder, hot rod in woman's private parts in Madhya PradeshThe survivor was subjected to two hours of brutal torture by her husband and in-laws, including physical abuse, burning with a hot iron rod, and the application of chilli powder to her private parts.

Video: Moment car ploughed 400 metres into crowded Germany Christmas marketAt least two people, including a young child, were killed, and over 60 others injured when a Saudi Arabian man living in Germany drove an SUV at high speed through a crowd of revellers at a Christmas market in Magdeburg. The incident occurred at around 7.00 pm local time.

CCTV footage shows the man driving through the market for over 400 meters, striking several people.

The suspect, identified as Taleb A., a 50-year-old medical doctor from Saudi Arabia residing in the eastern state of Saxony-Anhalt, has been arrested, according to regional officers.

Another video showed the driver's arrest, with police aiming their handguns and shouting, "Lie down, hands on your back, don't move!" at the bearded man wearing glasses, who was lying on the ground next to the heavily damaged vehicle.

PM on 2-day Kuwait visit from today, first by Indian Prime Minister in 43 yearsDuring his two-day visit to Kuwait, Prime Minister Narendra Modi will hold talks with the Kuwaiti leadership, attend a football tournament, visit a labour camp and address an Indian community event there.

Will miss 'mentor' R Ashwin, but we need to move on: Ravindra JadejaIndia spinner Ravindra Jadeja reckons he will miss R Ashwin, saying that the retired spinner was an on-field mentor for him. Ashwin and Jadeja took 587 wickets in 58 Tests together.
Jaipur LPG tanker blast toll rises to 14, 30 critical, compensation announcedThe LPG tanker explosion on the Jaipur-Ajmer highway has killed 14, with 30 of the 80 injured in critical condition.

Barack Obama's 2024 film recommendations: All We Imagine As Light tops the listBarack Obama has listed Payal Kapadia's film, All We Imagine As Light, as his top movie recommendation for 2024, highlighting its international acclaim. The list also features films like Dune: Part Two, Conclave, and more.

2 men involved in 'partner swap club' arrested after woman alleges coercionThe operation, named "swingers", reportedly lured couples into exchanging partners for sexual activities, exploiting women through coercion and blackmail.

Stranger Things 5 cast wraps shoot, Netflix show to release in 2025 The filming of Stranger Things 5 has concluded, and the final season is set for a 2025 release. The season's wrap was announced with behind-the-scenes photos featuring the cast and crew.

Musk also endorsed Germany's far-right AfD, intensifying political tensions ahead of the February 23 election.

'Next to me was a dead body': German market attack survivors describe carnageA festive evening in Magdeburg turned tragic as a car rammed through a crowded Christmas market, killing two, including a child, and injuring over 60. Survivors and witnesses described scenes of horror, chaos, and heartbreak.

Shreyas hopes to win IPL title with Punjab, excited to reunite with PontingShreyas Iyer wants to win the Indian Premier League (IPL) 2025 title with Punjab Kings. PBKS acquired Shreyas for Rs 26.75 crore in the IPL 2025 auction.

education.headline: The role of data analytics in modern advertising educationThis transformation also exercises a significant impact on the realm of 'advertising education.'

NCERT deletes Azad Pak, adds China's aggression reference in Class 12 textbookThe NCERT has made final changes to its Class 12 Political Science textbook syllabus for the upcoming academic year, including a revision in reference to India's border situation with China, Azad Pakistan, Article 370 and more.

NEET row: Bihar cops find 6 post-dated cheques 'issued for question paper brokers'Six post-dated cheques which were suspected to have been issued in favour of mafia demanding over Rs 30 lakh from each candidate seeking alleged leaked question paper ahead of NEET held last month were recovered by Bihar Police.

Forest fires surge tenfold from 2004 to 2017: Causes, impact and preventionAmidst a relentless surge, intense forest fires are now multiplying tenfold, casting a menacing shadow over our flora and fauna. Year by year, their fiery grip tightens, threatening ecosystems far and wide, now extending their reach to impact human lives.

Fresh plea in Supreme Court to recall NEET results, reconduct examsA fresh petition has been filed in the Supreme Court to recall the National Entrance cum Eligibility Test - Under Graduate (NEET-UG) 2024 results and re-conduct fresh examination after discrepancies in the declared results.

NTA issues clarification after NEET result controversy over toppers, high cut-offIn a detailed statement, the National Testing Agency (NTA) said that the increase in cut-off and number of toppers in the NEET-UG reflect the competitive nature of the exam and maintained that the test's integrity has not been compromised.

Exclusive: Arvind Kejriwal claims 'BJP succession war, PM backing Amit Shah'Speaking exclusively to India Today TV, Delhi Chief Minister Arvind Kejriwal claimed that there is a "succession war" within the BJP. He also claimed that the ruling party is "not fighting the Lok Sabha elections as a team".

4 medical students arrested in Bihar for appearing as proxies for NEET aspirantsFour MBBS students who appeared in place of NEET aspirants in the medical entrance exam were detained in Bihar's Purnea.
